welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Aloha, the charming city known for its beautiful beaches and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and experience everything our city has to offer, and we hope you enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Portland Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Portland Airport is used for general aviation and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Portland International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Portland International Airport primarily serves Alaska Airlines and its partners.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Portland International Airport serves various airlines including American Airlines, Delta, and United.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C at Portland International Airport serves airlines such as JetBlue, Southwest, and Spirit.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mal Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for a fee.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Troutdale Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Troutdale Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
